<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs=""
>
[The Publican](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2486)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Harrow Court" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=496" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #190: The Choosing](/Sources.aspx?ID=198) pg. 80</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Publican_ represents friendship, shelter, and insight. As long as you have _The Publican_ invested, treat critically failed checks made to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) as regular failures instead. If you are at least 14th level, the circumstance bonus you provide for succeeding or critically succeeding at checks to Aid increases by 1.

<document level="2" id="action-2034" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: The Publican
